Package controller

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class which provides control logic for the various components of the Customers screen, including: adding, updating, selecting, and deleting customers; viewing all customers in a table that directly corresponds to the applicable customers table from the database (except that date/times are displayed in user's local time); and filtering table by ID or name. Customers are added to, updated to, and deleted from both the database and their corresponding Customer objects. To maintain relational integrity, all appointments associated with a given customer are deleted when that customer is deleted.

  • Method Details

    • clearFields

      public void clearFields()
      Clears all Customer text fields, sets combo boxes default, and enables the Add button.

    • fillCustomerTable

      public void fillCustomerTable()
      Method that sets up customer TableView columns corresponding to customer table in database. "populated" boolean ensure columns are not populated multiple times. Calls refreshTable() method to fill rows.

    • refreshTable

      public void refreshTable(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Overloaded method that takes rows of data from database per passed ResultSet and populates the customer table accordingly. All DateTimes are converted from UTC to user's local time zone.
      Parameters:
      rs - The ResultSet from a database select query that pulls the relevant database table information.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • refreshTable

      public void refreshTable(javafx.collections.ObservableList<ResultSet> rsList) throws SQLException
      Overloaded method that takes ObservableList of ResultSets stemming from multiple SELECT-FROM-WHERE queries and filters the customer accordingly. All DateTimes are converted from UTC to user's local time zone.
      Parameters:
      rsList - The ResultSet ObservableList from database select queries that pull the relevant database table information to filter the customer table.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • fillStateProvinceComboBox

      public void fillStateProvinceComboBox() throws SQLException
      Fills state/province combo box corresponding to the country chosen by user. Ensures referential integrity between first-level divisions and countries.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • filterTable

      public void filterTable(String text) throws SQLException
      Filters customer table by String provided in the "Search by" text field. Method will first check if user provided an integer, in which case it will search by customer ID. Otherwise, it will search by customer name. If no results are found, an error alert will pop up.
      Parameters:
      text - The text input from user.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the Customer controller class. Populates default data for combo boxes and tables.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Per Initializable javadoc reference: "The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known."
      resourceBundle - Per Initializable javadoc reference: "The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized."
